info.title: Echo API
info.description: Simple Rest API that returns back info about the request.

get.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

post.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

put.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

delete.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

patch.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

options.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

head.description: Wildcard route which will echo any given path.

get.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
get.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

post.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
post.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

put.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
put.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

delete.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
delete.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

patch.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
patch.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

options.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
options.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

head.summary: Set the HTTP Status Code for the echoed response.
head.description: Generates a HTTP response with a give {statusCode} parameter.

statusCode.name: statusCode
statusCode.description: HTTP Status Code to be echoed. Must be between 200 and 599.

method.description: HTTP Method used in the original request.

path.description: Path url used in the original request.

argument.description: Argument used in the original request.

body.description: Body used in the original request.

headers.description: HTTP Headers used in the original request.
